content: Huge updates for Project `Krugurt` utility module. Added (SW) service worker to add `3rd-party` assets store in-app persistent cache. Simply call *krunch.addCache()* the method with an array of URLs will do.
Updating the playground and boilerplate for the upcoming new project `Krugurt`. Giving you an idea of how to craft UI with `Yogurt` and componentizing with `Krunch` ecosystem.
Added offline `service worker` to project `Krugurt`. Make your website or web apps running without the internet connection. Isn't that beautiful?
Project `Golem GUI AppStore` has been pending for a year, it's time to continue to work on what is left. But I decided to revamp it with `Krugurt` toolkit.
Working on the new `noozy` version `4`, an audiophile grade music player for the latest Android. A 12 types of sound processors and advanced sound modeling options in the design.

`kraft` prototype 3.x giving artist the superpower to produce UI components without knowing how to code, Kraft has it all, when you creating or organizing objects, it generates CSS code real-time, you just need to export it.

Made another version of `Playmemories` for desktop (Linux). It can manipulates the Sony Cybershot LensStyle Camera device remotely and Auto-Focusing with a mouse-click on the shoot area. Video recording and zoom control. The binary version available!
`Equilibrium`, a lightweight backup utility for Linux Terminal. Now with a brand new CLI for easy editing setttings and adding exclusion for files or folders that you don't want.
`Yogurt, CandyBar` prototype and the example. This tool crafts beautiful GPU Accelerated UI without user to learn CSS and write CSS code.
New `golem` updates for both CLI (v2.0.21) and SDK (v2.0.47). You can now upgrading all the installed apps with a single command in Terminal.
